feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.34
entry.content:
DO NOT UPDATE TO THIS VERSION, PLEASE USE 1.1.35 INSTEAD! A BUG WAS DISCOVERED WHICH BROKE ALL WINDOWS VERSIONS LESS THAN 8.1 FROM WORKING WITH MESHCENTRAL!

  • c16ff899 Version 1.1.34
  • 041e8021 Added test Windows x86-32, x86-64, ARM-64 agents.
  • 6e31562e feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option (#6453)
  • 874ef23c Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 (#6562)
  • 7bd5b66e Disabled Firebase support on NodeJS 23 for now, added warning.
  • 975e49a1 use @seald-io/nedb for node23 support (#6561)
  • 462c383b update openid-client to 5.7.1
  • dbb5b4ba add webrelay to websocket and meshctrl #6484
  • 545bf58e fix pwa orientation #6554
  • 30b390bd increase usernames to 128 for oidc identifiers #6447
  • d0a51e90 fix mobile ui file upload #6543 #6460
  • c773857b Add forgotten space in query GetNodeEventsWithLimit (#6541)
  • cae1f7ea Switched to BlueSky
  • b398cb7f bootstrap: more fixes and icon changes part 2
  • 5a1a97ca Fix quoting of string literals from double to single (#6530)
  • dd21f14f Mariadb/mysql: Fix ssl option on autobackup cmdline and deprecated warnings (#6537)
  • 3da60b43 fix adding meshes and user groups in a peering environment (#6534)
  • 727080ab bootstrap: more fixes and icon changes
  • 54170c44 bootstrap: fix files edit file feature
  • 8a5ad156 adjust removemeshuser to allow for shorter user ids (#6520)
  • 911d987a fix actions modal popup and icon changes
  • 9a8f4e8e bootstrap: fix edit node and duplicate lastbootuptime
  • badee98b fix badlogins naming #6516
  • d44faed2 fix filter input #6498 #6507
  • 01c585f7 Added the ability to fetch timestamp for codesigning through https (#6510)
  • 777eb534 Add sqlite config options (#6517)
  • b71c69e8 Fix autobackup defaults and zip level for performance (#6518)
  • 7d59210d swap powershell write to command instead
  • fc387ca4 set backup vars on object for acess and fix nedb backup #6481
  • fc83211e open note urls in new tab #4091
  • 9ebd23a5 restore login screen enter button use #6494
  • 3f8301e9 Put dbdumpfile back in root of zip instead of meshcentral-data subfolder and normalize some more (#6500)
  • b3923564 more wmic replacements
  • 0ec8b061 Revert "require package version from correct folder"
  • e58d659f Fix archiver error, add backup options and SQLite maintenance (#6487)

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.35
entry.content:
• 8e8ec4f8 Version 1.1.35
  • 18167499 chore: update pluginHandler.js (#6569)
  • da5d03b0 fix annoying firefox paste option with clipboard #6571
  • c41eb72a fix win7+server2008r2 powershell/wmi
  • ef4d764a Revert "swap powershell write to command instead" to fix win7/server2008r2

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.36
entry.content:
IF YOU USE minify: true ITS ADVISED TO UPDATE TO 1.1.37 THIS IS DUE TO A MINIFY BUG WHICH BROKE THE NEW BOOTSTRAP UI!

  • b6e022c0 Version 1.1.36
  • e66776c5 if no nodes return nothing for getDeviceDetails #6637
  • d1cb184e fix deleting user with no events causes page to not change
  • 6aa60d55 fix reload issue with # in url
  • 8d4e9bce Re-enable autobackups by default (#6644) (#6653)
  • eb0d24cf fix trafficstats with novnc
  • fe02d315 add pwr,conn,agct,cict to getDeviceDetails #6650
  • 61d3487f add prometheus metrics (#6654)
  • a23725eb fix trafficstats relaycount NaN
  • 9b60271f Update index.md
  • 31f32808 Update security.md
  • 7aa4061c Update security.md
  • 54bb0177 Update index.md
  • ce70f4ac Update LICENSE, fix license year (#6646)
  • f712cd94 Fixes multi domain using default domain cert without trying to recreate for new domains (#6645)
  • c4592dcc Fixed Duo Boost UI.
  • 2a274fe5 More Duo UI improvements.
  • 5d0b5acd Duo UI improvements.
  • f80ba62c Fixed Duo 2FA security.
  • 5da84906 fix: db.js expire server stats comment typo (#6633)
  • 68ac8cf8 fix duo and theme switcher
  • 8e70cd71 [NEW] Add Theme Switcher with Bootstrap/Bootswatch Themes (#6622)
  • 5cf46815 fix duo and package.json
  • c92b88a3 Duo changes, but not yet fully tested.
  • 1b01b90c bootstrap3: dark mode fixes, buttons replaced, more translate fixes #6496
  • 6a366fe1 bootstrap3: fix translations, fix button styling, new contextmenus, mouse disable cursor #6496
  • e2362a05 add duo authentication support (#6609)
  • 59fcc0db fix bootstrap 3 record session formatting #6618
  • 988983b8 alpine 3.21 and node 22 in docker
  • a1854fa0 fix createmesh with email as userid #6596
  • 22fc9592 Fixed module update for modules like firebase-admin.js
  • c2eb1f25 Updated to MeshCentral Firebase support, updated to using firebase-admin module.
  • 832d1173 fix defender not showing
  • ab7be919 fix meshcmd amtinfo UNCAUGHT EXCEPTION #4135
  • 624d61db move windows_volumes and bitlocker to win-volumes
  • b0d8e3fe package updates
  • a3304774 add OS Descripton to Details #6556
  • 39e81bef fix bitlocker/manage-bde cmdline (#6586)
  • 8eeb96fb Spelling mistake in German translation (#6585)
  • f9228ad0 connectinArgs.Database > connectinArgs.database typo (#6576)
  • ce4217c3 fix messenger background notifications #2440
  • d9262f7c update translate, fix bootstrap version panel, deskbackground

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.37
entry.content:
• 998769a8 Version 1.1.37
  • ca6ec5eb fix delete node bootstrap ui
  • 0dd56d57 improve translations all around
  • 95729d2a set default minify to false in docker
  • 1ae7b9f6 fix minify in bootstrap #6662
  • c66a9a12 i hate sundays, fix passport module again
  • 2c310450 fix passport module not installing for multiple domains

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.38
entry.content:
• 763f76b6 Version 1.1.38
  • 1a02539f Added support for &gotodeviceip=x.x.x.x (#6672)
  • 90b71e92 properly fix multiple dialog popups in a row
  • 73c18c4d fix deviceaction multiple modals not working
  • def62075 fix theme switch to default bug and include google fonts in csp #6665
